text: Just watched Rihanna's SuperBowl. She was beautiful, loved that she announced her second pregnancy during it. And... After all... It was Rihanna's show, literally. She performed hits, deep cuts, collabs and even though she wasn't so energetic (she's pregnant, of course)...
This pregnancy really gotta go .
Pregnancy is scary.., 🙆🏾‍♀️

So funny to me the people slating Rihanna .. if you can’t appreciate a pregnant woman with how exhausting pregnancy is - with her lungs being crushed at present by a small human being - actually doing a 13 minute vocal/dance performance - shut up.

I wish y’all would give Rihanna more grace. While she wasn’t as dynamic as you’d have liked, she is also very far along in her pregnancy. Pregnancy affects women quite differently and you don’t know how it affected her mobility. Let’s enjoy the performance for what it was.
They need to give her a BREAK🤣 she is pregnant!! Imagine performing at the superbowl on your period? Pregnancy is basically that on steroids

I was so sick during my pregnancy, in and out of the hospital. Had respiratory infections, putting stress on my heart and baby. I was so scared of miscarrying. Le doy gracias a Diosito por cuidarnos. 💙 One month closer to Adriel’s half birthday and its still feels surreal. 🤍💙

A visibly pregnant Rihanna performed at the Superbowl last night and that is awesome. It's also a good time to remind people that Black women are 3 times more likely to die from a pregnancy-related cause than white women in the US and perhaps we should do something about that.
